name: Aimed Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and gain 2 layer of Concentration(Each layer of Concentration increases Hit rate by 1%)

name: Arrow Barrage
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units

name: Aspect of the Eagle
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on enemy units and command Hawks to aid. Heal yourself for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 10 seconds

name: Boar's Rush
description: Summon a boar to ram into the enemy and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG and stun the target for x seconds (The Stun effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Burning Shot
description: Fire 3 burning shots to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 enemy units, apply the Scorch state and reduce their healing effects by x% for 10s.

name: Explosive Shot
description: Fire an explosive charge into the enemy target and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 enemy units. If the targets are in the Scorch effect, the DMG dealt increases by 20%

name: Flaying Arrow
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on enemy units and heal yourself for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Hawk Call - Gal
description: Summon Hawk - Gal. It inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy upon each strike and lasts for 12 seconds. For each Hawk present on the battlefield when summoned, increase DMG by 25%

name: Hawk Call - Gal II
description: Summon 3 Hawk - Gal. It inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy upon each strike and lasts for 10 seconds. For each Hawk present on the battlefield when summoned, increase DMG by 25%

name: Hawk Call - Pan
description: Summon Hawk - Pan and increase Hunter's Impale rate by x%. Pan inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG upon each strike and lasts for 22 seconds.

name: Hawk Call - Sheen
description: Summon Hawk - Sheen and increase Hunter's Crit rate by x%. Sheen inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG upon each strike and lasts for 22 seconds.

name: Lunar Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and lower the target's Healing by x% for 10 seconds

name: Lunar Shot II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and lower the target xx%'s healing for 10 seconds. The effect doubles on none player units

name: Multi-Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 enemy units

name: Numbing Shot
description: Fire a spearhead Arrow to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the target and interrupt its skill casting (The Interrupted effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Piercing Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and release up to 3 layers of Concentration, each dealing a bonus 25% of DMG

name: Quick Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and release 1 layer of Concentration.

name: Quick Shot II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and release 1 layer of Concentration. Next skill increase 20% DMG

name: Scatter Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and remove x random buffs. Successful removal increases DMG by 10%

name: Steady Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and shorten the next skill's charging time by x%

name: Storm Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy.

name: Storm Shot II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy. If you are in possession of any Concentration Point, DMG increase by 20%

name: Sunder Armor Shot
description: Deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor.

name: Sunder Armor Shot II
description: Deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor. Get bonus 5% Armor Resistance for each Concentration

name: Volley
description: Launch 4 random attacks, each inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If a same target is hit consecutively, the DMG dealt decreases (by 25% every time to a maximum 50%)

name: Weakpoint Shot
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the DMG

name: Weakpoint Shot II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the DMG. For every 10% of the enemy's HP dropped, deal an additional 5% of skill bleeding DMG within 3 seconds

name: Song of Protection
description: Sing the Song of Protection to heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 3 seconds. The lower the teammate's HP, the higher the heal

name: Seed of Replenishment
description: Throw 2 Seeds to heal 2 teammates with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Force of Bud
description: Heal all party for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds and gift them the seed of life. If a target already has a seed of life, increase healing by 10%

name: Tranquility
description: Heal all party for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 4 seconds. Instantly heal for another 25% of the HP restored for each layer of seed of life the teammates own

name: Ukaka Transform
description: Transform into Ukaka and increase your DMG by xx%. For the first 10 seconds after the transformation, each attack inflicts a bonus xx%(+xx) ATK DMG.

name: Quills
description: Attack 3 random enemy units and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. At the same time, heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx)

name: Flower Seed
description: Throw Flower Seeds at 3 random enemy units and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If the targets are killed within xx seconds, the seeds will heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Mend
description: Heal the most injured teammate for xx%(+xx) of ATK and another same amount of HP over 5 seconds.

name: Mend II
description: Heal the most injured teammate for xx%(+xx) of ATK and another same amount of HP over 5 seconds. Also, obtain a shield of 60% of that skill for 10 seconds

name: Lilly Transform II
description: Transform into the Lilly form to increase xx% heal effect and Heal over time effect by 10% and restore HP of xx%(+xx) ATK for the teammate with the lowest HP within 5 seconds

name: Lilly Transform
description: Transform into the Lilly form to increase xx% heal effect and restore HP of xx%(+xx) ATK for the teammate with the lowest HP within 5 seconds

name: Quills Thrust
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and lower the enemy's Healing by xx%

name: Extended Healing
description: Cast a Branch Shield for the teammate with the lowest HP. The shield's value equals to xx%(+xx) ATK. It absorbs 80% of the DMG received by the teammate for 10 seconds

name: Tree Ward
description: Cast the Tree Ward for the most injured teammate and heal for xx%(+xx) of ATK. If in the Lily state, cast an extra shield with xx% of the HP recovered. It lasts for 10 seconds

name: New Bud
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and silence the targets for xx seconds(The Silence effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Song of Life
description: Sing the Song of Life to heal the most injured teammate for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Purification Seed
description: Purify the teammate with the lowest HP. Heal for xx%(+xx) of ATK and shield it from any debuff for xx seconds

name: Life Bloom
description: Remove x debuffs for all party members and heal xx%(+xx) of ATK. Increase the HP recovered by 10% for each debuff removed

name: Revitalize Nature
description: Cast a shield of xx%(+xx) of ATK for teammates, alsting 10 seconds

name: Natural Aegis
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds, and shorten your next skill's guiding time by 0.8 seconds

name: Seed of Life
description: Heal all party for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds and gift them the seed of life.

name: Binding Heal
description: Heal yourself and the most injured teammate for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds

name: Luna Blessing
description: Guide the Luna Blessing and heal 2 most injured teammates for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 4 seconds

name: Soul Seal
description: Apply bonus Soul Seal to the enemy. Each layer of Soul Seal causes xx%(+xx) ATK DMG every 2 seconds for 24 seconds. 1 layer is added upon inflicting DMG each time, to a max of 10 layers. When the target dies, the seals will be passed on to nearby enemy units (Seal Damage with a Crit Hit)

name: Soul Seal II
description: Apply Soul Seal to the enemy. Each layer of Soul Seal causes xx%(+xx) ATK DMG every 2 seconds for 24 seconds. 1 layer is added upon inflicting DMG each time, to a max of 11 layers. When the target dies, the seals will be passed on to nearby enemy units (Seal Damage with a Crit Hit)

name: Life Tap
description: Sacrifice 30% of your HP to instantly restore 3 points of energy. xx%(+xx) of the sacrificed HP will return to the warlock over 12 seconds

name: Life Tap II
description: Sacrifice 30% of your HP to instantly restore 3 points of energy. xx%(+xx) of the sacrificed HP will return to the warlock over 12 seconds. Next skill DMG increase 6%

name: Dragonfire
description: Attack all enemy units and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG over 5 seconds. For enemy targets with the Burn Seal, deal bonus 20% DMG. During the duration of the skill, the DMG received by Warlocks increases by 25%.

name: Multi-Ignition
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 random enemy units

name: Multi-Ignition II
description: Deal Warlock of ATK DMG on 3 random enemies, and damage is increased by xx% if enemies are afflicted with Burn Seal

name: Incinerate
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all the enemies over 5 seconds

name: Soul Twins
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy. If the target has the Soul Seal, add 1 bonus Soul Seal (deal the same amount of DMG with the Soul Twins over 6 seconds)

name: Soul Wave
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and reset the effective duration of its Soul Seal

name: Summon Violent Frog
description: Summon the Violent Frog for xx%(+xx) of Warlock's ATK for 14 seconds

name: Conflagrate
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and apply bonus Burn Seal

name: Chain Ignition
description: Attack an enemy unit twice, each inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If the target's HP is below x%, launch 1 bonus attack

name: Chain Ignition II
description: Attack the enemy target twice, each time of which inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If the target's HP is below xx%, launch 2 bonus attacks

name: Ignition
description: Burn the enemy. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG over 10 seconds and lower its Healing by x%.

name: Ignition II
description: Burn the enemy, inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG within 10 seconds, and lower xx%'s healing. The effect doubles on none player units.

name: Soul Lash
description: Deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy over 3 seconds. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor.

name: Soul Lash II
description: Deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy over 3 seconds. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor. For every layer of Soul Seal on the enemy, an additional 1% increase in Armor Resistance is applied.

name: Summon Pharmacist Frog
description: Summon a Pharmacist Frog with xx%(+xx) of Warlock's ATK for 26 secs. Pharmacist Frog's attacks heal warlock for 20% of its DMG. Up to 30% of the warlock's Max HP can be restored

name: Drain
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy over 12 seconds and remove x buffs. Successful removal increases DMG by 10%

name: Painful Ignition
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy

name: Polymorph: Frog
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on an enemy unit and transform the target into a Big-Eyed Frog for x seconds. Successful interruption doubles the effective duration of the transformation (The Transformed effect has a 100% Hit rate for enemy units at Lvx or lower)

name: Summon Elder Frog
description: Summon the Elder Frog with xx%(+xx) of Warlock's ATK for 14 seconds. The Elder Frog can attack 3 enemy units at the same time

name: Soul Rebirth
description: Guide the Soul Force to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy every 2 seconds, and heal xx%(+xx) of ATK. Lasts for 8 seconds

name: Quack quack quack
description: Imitate a frog's croak to amuse the enemy. Silence the target for x seconds and inflict a bonus xx%(+xx) ATK DMG (The Silence effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Frog Synergy
description: Attack 3 enemy units. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG and extend Elder Frog's effective duration by 6 seconds

name: Dehydration
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy over 12 seconds

name: Stockpile
description: Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds, during which recover 1 point of energy if xx% of HP lost

name: Call to Arms
description: Inspire your party and increase ATK by xx%(+xx) for 6 seconds

name: Call to Arms II
description: Inspire your party and increase ATK by xx%(+xx) , increasing Block Rate by 15% for 6 seconds. Also, obtain a shield, absorbing 30% of Armor damage for 6 seconds

name: Last Stand
description: Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds, during which the DMG received is reduced by 10%

name: Unbreakable Will
description: Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds. The lower the HP, the higher the shield points

name: Unbreakable Will II
description: Obtain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds. The lower the HP, the higher the shield value. If the HP is below 30%, gain an additional 20% of Armor for 5 seconds

name: Swipe
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy units ahead of you. Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for each enemy target hit for 12 seconds

name: Lion's Roar
description: Roar to interrupt the enemy's skill casting and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. Successful interruption increases your block rate by xx% for 12 seconds (The Interrupted effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Bramble Shield
description: Gain a Thorn Shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds. When the shield breaks, inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy unit in front of it

name: Hoo hah hah
description: Reduce DMG taken by teammates by xx% for 12 seconds. Up to xx%(+xx) of your Armor can be reduced

name: Hoo hah hah II
description: Reduce DMG taken by teammates by xx% for 12 seconds. Up to xx%(+xx) of your Armor can be reduced and obtain a shield of that value

name: Powerful Knock up II
description: Attack the enemy with heavy punches, inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG, and knock the target into the air (This effect has a 100% hit rate on any enemy target Lv. x or lower). If the skill casting is interrupted, cause an additional control effect of 1 second.

name: Powerful Knock up
description: Attack the enemy with heavy punches, inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG, and knock the target into the air (This effect has a 100% hit rate on any enemy target Lv. x or lower).

name: Safeguard
description: Gain a shield with xx%(+xx) Armor and take xx% DMG received by the teammate with the lowest HP upon every attack for 12 seconds

name: Safeguard II
description: Gain a shield with xx%(+xx) Armor and take xx% DMG received by the teammate with the lowest HP upon every attack for 12 seconds. 30% DMG reduction

name: Giant's Return
description: Transform into a giant and gain Control Immunity for xx seconds. Obtain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds

name: Fearless Shield
description: Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds, during which convert xx% of the first skill DMG received into a shield for 12 seconds

name: Resolution
description: Gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds

name: Unwavering Will
description: Remove x random debuffs for yourself and gain a shield of xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds

name: Come here
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy. If in the Overwhelming Assault state, the attack will aim at the enemy unit with the lowest HP, and the target will be pulled over and stunned for 1 seconds (The Pulled effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Overwhelming Assault
description: Enter the Overwhelming Assault state and lower Armor 30% to increase ATK by 30%. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy with the lowest HP, and lower its healing by xx%. In the Overwhelming Assault state, the skill's DMG increases by 50%

name: Shield of Protection
description: Obtain a shield with xx%(+xx) Armor for 12 seconds. If in the Protection Stance, the shield effect increases by 50%

name: Final Blow
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy. If in the Overwhelming Assault state, DMG increases by 20%. If the target is killed within x seconds, gain a shield with HP of xx%(+xx) of Armor for 12 seconds

name: Protection Stance
description: Enter the Protection stance to increase your Block by xx%(+xx) for x seconds, during which Armor increases by 1% upon each successful block for up to 10% of Armor

name: Hoo kham kham II
description: Taunt all enemies to attack you and gain a shield (xx%(+xx) of Armor) for 12 seconds (The Taunt effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower). Gain an additional shield of 5% skill for each enemy taunted

name: Hoo kham kham
description: Taunt all enemies to attack you and gain a shield (xx%(+xx) of Armor) for 12 seconds (The Taunt effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Cloak of Bush
description: Disguise as a bush to gain Control Immunity for 6 seconds and increase DMG mitigation by xx% and ATK by xx%(+xx)

name: Rupture
description: Inflict bleeding DMG of xx%(+xx) ATK over 6 seconds and gain 3 Technique Points (Each Technique Point increases Evasion by 1%)

name: Lacerations
description: Deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor.

name: Backstab
description: Create a phantom and instantly move it behind the enemy, inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. The phantom will launch a bonus attack for each Technique Point

name: Scatter Blade
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and remove x buffs. Successful removal increases DMG by 10%

name: Poison Coat
description: Apply Bonus Poison effect to the enemy. Each Layer of Poison causes xx%(+xx) ATK DMG per second for 12 seconds. One layer is added upon each basic attack dealt by an Assassin to a max of 15 layers. When the target dies the seals will be passed on the nearby enemy units.

name: Roundhouse
description: Charge 0.5 seconds and then kick the enemy. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG and interrupt the target (The Interrupted effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at LvX or lower)

name: Shiv
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and reset the effective duration of Poison

name: Pounce
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and gain 2 Technique Points (Each Technique Point increases Evasion by 1%)

name: Pursuing
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the DMG

name: Fish Bone Throwing Knife
description: Throw between 1 and 3 fish bone throwing knives with a barb to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy. If the enemy targets have Poison DMG increases by 25%

name: Reverberating Slam
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy

name: Reverberating Slam II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy. If the enemy has one layer of Poison, dealing a bonus 2% of DMG

name: Double Throw Knives
description: Hurl throwing knives at 3 random enemy units and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG

name: Reckless Lunge
description: Attack the enemy 3 times, each time inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG

name: Bounce Bounce Bounce
description: Toss 1 knife which will bounce between enemies and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG (by default 1 enemy bounces once)

name: Fan of Knives
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 random enemy units and gain Combo

name: Zeal
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and heal for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 6 seconds. The lower your HP, the higher your healing

name: Ambush
description: Cast up to 2 Technique Points to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG tot the enemy and stun the target for 1 second. Each Technique Point extends the stun by 0.5 seconds (The Stun effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at LvX or lower)

name: Fatal Knife
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 enemy units. If in the Combo state, DMG increases by xx%

name: Swiftwind Daggers
description: Hurl 4 throwing knives randomly, each inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If the same target is hit consecutively, the DMG dealt decreases (by 25% every time to a maximum 50%)

name: Uppercut II
description: Attack the enemy with uppercuts, inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG, and knock the target into the air (This effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower). If the skill casting is interrupted, cause the additional control effect for x second

name: Intercept
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on an enemy unit and interrupt its skill casting. Successful interruption reduces DMG received from the enemy by xx% for 10 seconds (The Interrupted effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Cleave
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on enemy units ahead of you and restore xx%(+xx) HP

name: Sacrifice
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds and take xx% of the DMG received every time for the teammate with the lowest HP

name: Sacrifice II
description: Recover xx%(+xx) HP over 10 sec, take xx% of the damage for the teammate with the lowest HP, and decrease the damage taken by 30%

name: Severing Strike
description: Consume 20% of your current HP to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy units in the back row. If the targets are killed within xx seconds, restore xx%(+xx) of your HP. If in the Frenzied state, DMG increases by 50%

name: Fevered Pursuit
description: Attack 3 times and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. If in the Frenzied state, attack range increases and attacks focus on the enemy unit with the lowest HP, stunning the target for x seconds (The Stun effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Frenzy
description: Enter the Frenzied state to increase ATK by 30%, at the cost of 30% Max HP. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy with the lowest HP, and lower its healing by xx%. In the Frenzied state, DMG increases by 50%

name: Let's charge
description: Inspire your party and increase ATK by xx%(+xx) for 6 seconds

name: Let's charge II
description: Inspire your party and increase ATK by xx%(+xx). Damage received is reduced by 15% for 6 seconds. Also, Heal 4.5% HP immediately

name: Barbarian Veins
description: Activate Barbarian Veins to raise Max hP by 10% for x seconds and restore HP of xx%(+xx) over 10 seconds

name: Blood Force
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds. If in the Barbarian Veins state, increase healing by 50%

name: Blood Howl
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds and reduce the DMG received by 10% for 10 seconds

name: Hoo hoo hoo
description: Reduce DMG received by other teammates by xx% over 10 seconds. Up to xx%(+xx) of your HP can be restored

name: Hoo hoo hoo II
description: Reduce DMG taken by other teammates by xx% over 10 seconds. Up to xx%(+xx) of your HP can be reduced and recover HP of that value

name: Toughen
description: Heal xx%(+xx) over 10 seconds, during which healing another xx% of the first skill DMG received

name: Uppercut
description: Attack the enemy with an uppercut, inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG, and knock the target into the air (This effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Hoo kham kham
description: Taunt all the enemies to attack you and restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds (The Taunt effect has a 100% hit rate for targets at Lv x or lower)

name: Hoo kham kham II
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP within 10 seconds, and taunt all the enemy targets (The Taunt effect has a 100% hit rate on targets Lv x or lower). Increase the Max HP by 5% skill for each target taunted

name: Ancestral Protection
description: Call for Ancestral Protection to increase healing by xx%. Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Ancestral Protection II
description: Summon the Ancestral Protection to increase your own xx% Totem heal effect by 10% and restore HP of xx%(+xx) ATK for the teammate with the lowest HP

name: Thunder Heart
description: Guide the Thunder Force and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 enemy units upon the next 3 basic attacks. Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx)

name: Electric Shock
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK and cast an electric current to travel back and forth between enemy units 5 times, each time inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG

name: Drums of Recovery
description: Play the drums and heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK. The lower the teammate's HP, the higher the healing

name: Drums of Recovery II
description: Sound the Drums of Recovery and restore xx%(+xx) ATK HP for the teammate with the lowest HP. The lower HP the teammate has, the higher HP it restores. If the teammate's HP is below 30%, provide an additional shield of 30% of the restored HP for 5 seconds

name: Fury of the Ancestors
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and lower the enemy's Healing by xx%

name: Spring Totem
description: Summon 1 Spring Totem to heal the 2 teammates with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds

name: Recovery Totem
description: Summon 1 Recovery Totem to heal the entire party for xx%(+xx) of ATK over 5 seconds

name: Font of Purge
description: Remove x debuffs for all party members and heal xx%(+xx) of ATK. Increase the HP recovered by 10% for each debuff removed

name: Rain Dance
description: Dance in the Rain to heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Riptide
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK, and another same amount of HP over 5 seconds

name: Riptide II
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK, and another same amount of HP over 5 seconds. Also increases 10% Healing in 8 seconds

name: Ancestral Gift
description: Pray for Ancestor's Strength to heal the party for xx%(+xx) of ATK and obtain 1 Ancestral Mark

name: Blessing of Spirits
description: Pray for Ancestor's Strength to heal the party for xx%(+xx) of ATK and obtain 1 Ancestral Mark. For those who already own the Ancestral Mark, healing increases by 10%

name: Faith Protection
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK. If in the Ancestral Protection state, provide the target with extra protection for 10 seconds and heal for another xx% of the HP restored when it is attacked in the next time.

name: Chain Heal
description: Release the Ancestral Mark to heal the party for xx%(+xx) of ATK. Increase healing by 25% for each Ancestral Mark you own

name: Chain Heal II
description: Release the Ancestral Mark to heal the party for xx%(+xx) of ATK. Increase healing by 25% for each Ancestral Mark you own and give 30% Damage Reduction to the targets, Up to 10% of that skill can be reduced from each Ancestral Mark for 10 seconds

name: Drums of Purge
description: Purity the teammate with the lowest HP. Heal them for xx%(+xx) of ATK and shield from any debuff for x seconds

name: Life Totem
description: Summon a Life Totem with HP of xx%(+xx) of ATK. Links to the teammate with the lowest HP to transfer 80% of their DMG received to the totem for 10 seconds

name: Drums of Rain
description: Heal the 2 teammates with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Drums of Rain II
description: Sound the hand drum to restore HP of xx%(+xx) ATK for 2 teammates with the lowest HP and reduce the DMG it receives by 15% for 5 seconds

name: Dance With Me
description: Heal yourself and the teammate with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK

name: Surge
description: Use the Life Force and heal the 2 teammates with the lowest HP for xx%(+xx) of ATK. Shorten the next skill's casting time by xx%

name: Ancestral Aegis
description: Protect the teammate with the lowest HP. Within 10 seconds, heal xx%(+xx) of ATK for each basic attack it receives. Can be triggered up to xx times

name: Charm Dance
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and silence the targets for xx seconds (The Silence effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Whirlwind
description: Spin 3 times to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units nearby. Restore xx%(+xx) HP per hit

name: Battle Shout
description: Remove x debuffs for yourself and restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds

name: Bloody Combat
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds, during which recovers 1 point of energy if the damage taken is more than xx% of HP

name: Death Denied
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 5 seconds. The lower the HP, the higher the healing

name: Death Denied II
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 5 seconds. The lower the HP, the higher the healing. If the HP is below 30%, restore additional 20% of the damage received within the next 5 seconds

name: Boil Blood
description: Restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds

name: Fan of Knives II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) of ATK DMG on 4 random enemy unit and get the Combo

name: Rising Rage
description: Immune to control effects for xx seconds and restore xx%(+xx) HP over 10 seconds

name: Magic Blast
description: Cast a Magic Blast to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy

name: Magic Intellect
description: Break through the upper limits of magic control. Shorten the next skill's casting time by xx% and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy

name: Magic Intellect II
description: Break through the upper limits of magic control. The next skill's casting time become zero and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy

name: Mirror Image
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and link yourself with 1 magic clone with HP of xx%(+xx) of ATK. Your DMG received will be transferred to the mirror Image. It lasts for 12 seconds

name: Meteorite
description: Form 3 huge fireballs to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 random enemy units

name: Lightning Wave
description: Attack all enemy units and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG

name: Fireball
description: Throw 1 fireball and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the DMG

name: Fireball II
description: Release 1 fireball to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. The lower the target's HP, the higher the damage. For each 10% of the enemy's HP dropped, summon 1 additional fireball to inflict 4% skill DMG

name: Scorch
description: Scorch the enemy and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy target. Crits cast the skill again

name: Fire Blast
description: Control fire to attack the enemy and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG. Next skill's Crit rate increases by xx%

name: Fire Blast II
description: Control fire to blast the enemy, inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG, and increase the next 2 skills xx%'s Crit. rate and 30% Crit DMG

name: Purification Wave
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and remove x random buffs. Successful removal increases DMG by 10%

name: Seal Storm
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 random enemy units and apply bonus Magic Seal

name: Terminal Storm
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on 3 random enemy units. If the targets have the Magic Seal, deal a bonus 50% of DMG

name: Lightning Blast
description: Cast Lightning Charge, deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor

name: Lightning Blast II
description: Cast Lightning Charge, deal xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to enemy. Skill ignores 20% of enemy's Armor and restore 1 point of energy

name: Serenity
description: Inflict bonus xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the first target of the next skill

name: Serenity II
description: Inflict bonus xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the first target of the next skill, and increase the next 2 skills' Crit. rate by 15%

name: Frost Missile
description: Fire 3 Frost Missiles to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and apply 3 layers of Frost (Every 4 layers of Frost will stun the target for 2 seconds) (The Frost effect has a 100% Hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Cone of Cold
description: Cast Ice to attack the enemy. Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the target, and apply 1 extra layer of Frost (Every 4 layers of Frost will stun the target for 2 seconds) (The Frost effect has a 100% Hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Frostbolt
description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, inflicting xx%(+xx) ATK DMG and adds 2 layers of Frost to the target (Every 4 layers of Frost will stun the target for 2 seconds) (The Frost effect has a 100% Hit rate for enemy units at Lv x or lower)

name: Magic Missile
description: Launches three waves of Magic Missiles at the enemy for 2 sec, causing xx%(+xx) ATK DMG per wave, with a 50% chance of recovering 1 point of energy - up to 2 points

name: Blizzard
description: Control a blizzard to inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units for 3 seconds. The DMG dealt to the enemy in the Cold state increases by 30%. Afterwards, apply bonus Cold state to all enemy units

name: Frost Nova
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on all enemy units and apply bonus Cold state to all targets. The DMG dealt to the enemy in the Cold state increases by 30%

name: Magic Suppression
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and lower the target xx%'s healing for 10 seconds.

name: Magic Suppression II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy and lower the target xx%'s healing for 10 seconds. The effect doubles on none player units

name: Silence
description: Silence the enemy target for x seconds and inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG (The Silence effect has a 100% hit rate for enemy units at Lv xx or lower)

name: Mortal Wounds
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG to the enemy and lower the target's Healing by xx% for 6 seconds

name: Pursuing II
description: Inflict xx%(+xx) ATK DMG on the enemy. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the DMG. For every 10% of the enemy's HP dropped, summon an additional phantom to deal 4% skill DMG

name: Poison Coat II
description: Cast the Poison effect on the enemy, each layer of which inflicts xx%(+xx) ATK DMG for 12 seconds. 1 layer is stacked upon each basic attack received from an assassin to a max of 17 layers. The seals will be passed on to nearby enemy targets upon the target's death
